page.title: 10The A75 Euroroute-1
page.content:
The A75{Euroroute}is notorious for its vehicle{accidents.}Over the past few years there have been numerous accidents, many of which resulted in serious injuries and death.
The main reason for this is the volume of traffic with which the A75 has to cope. Lorries choose this route to go south into the country from the ferry port at Stranraer and since the Heysham Line was closed down, there has been an increase in their numbers. Not only is the volume of traffic a problem but also the{size and weight. It was bad enough when the lorries were{32 tons,}but an increase in weight to{38 tons}has led to serious problems. The council have a never ending job repairing and maintaining the road and the vibrations caused by the heavy lorries going by cause
